channel.title: [317]Ehh help?[317]
channel.description: I just downloaded a client that is supposed to go with a server i wanna try out, and the compiler for the client works, but the run doesnt this is what my run.bat is [code]@echo off :menu cls title RuneXC Client echo Client Tools echo. echo R - Press letter R to run the RuneXC client. echo C - Press letter C to compile the client,* use the compiler.bat to compile* echo E - Press letter E to exit the RuneXC client echo www.runexc.tk is the website! JOIN please, to benefit in server ways! echo Thanks For using RuneXC Client! echo. set /p option=Option: if %option%==c goto compile if %option%==C goto compile if %option%==R goto run if %option%==r goto run if %option%==rc goto CR if %option%==RC goto CR if %option%==rC goto CR if %option%==Rc goto CR if %option%==cr goto CR if %option%==CR goto CR if %option%==cR goto CR if %option%==Cr goto CR if %option%==e goto exit if %option%==E goto exit if %option%==* goto error goto error :compile title Compiler cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause goto menu :run cls title RuneXC Client Run java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 cls pause :CR title Compile-Run cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java title xpvpxx Client java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 cls pause :exit cls exit :error cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type in are correct. pause cls goto menu[/code] oh and my variables and everything are correct. i edited the java inside the code to match my java also.

item.title: [317]Ehh help?[317]
item.dc:creator: @mollyscape mollyscape
item.description:
@mollyscape wrote:

I just downloaded a client that is supposed to go with a server i wanna try out, and the compiler for the client works, but the run doesnt this is what my run.bat is Code:

@echo off
:menu
cls
title RuneXC Client
echo Client Tools
echo.
echo R - Press letter R to run the RuneXC client.
echo C - Press letter C to compile the client,* use the compiler.bat to compile*
echo E - Press letter E to exit the RuneXC client
echo www.runexc.tk is the website! JOIN please, to benefit in server ways!
echo Thanks For using RuneXC Client!
echo.
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==c goto compile
if %option%==C goto compile
if %option%==R goto run
if %option%==r goto run
if %option%==rc goto CR
if %option%==RC goto CR
if %option%==rC goto CR
if %option%==Rc goto CR
if %option%==cr goto CR
if %option%==CR goto CR
if %option%==cR goto CR
if %option%==Cr goto CR
if %option%==e goto exit
if %option%==E goto exit
if %option%==* goto error
goto error
:compile
title Compiler
cls
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
goto menu
:run
cls
title RuneXC Client Run
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
cls
pause
:CR
title Compile-Run
cls
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
title xpvpxx Client
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
cls
pause
:exit
cls
exit
:error
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu

oh and my variables and everything are correct. i edited the java inside the code to match my java also.

Another Noob, requesting Spoon feeding.

  • Molly

Read full topic
